Please reach out to our Customer Support team and we would be happy to provide you with a discount code.

Thank you for your service.

During each step of checkout, there is a box to the right of the screen where you can enter a discount code. Simply enter it here and click "Apply" before completing your order.

If on a mobile device, you must go to checkout, and click "Add a discount code or a gift card" where you may enter your code and hit the arrow to apply.

If you wish to opt out of receiving emails from us, please use the unsubscribe link at the bottom of any of our emails.

Alternatively, please feel free to reach out to us, and we would be happy to help unsubscribe you.

Was this article helpful? 2 0

The Switch is a weekly newsletter on what's changing. It is an easy way to receive impactful stories in your inbox.

With everything that changes, there‚Äôs a before and after; a knowing and not knowing. It‚Äôs a lightbulb moment, an intellectual discovery ‚Äî a change that feels so natural we wonder why it didn‚Äôt happen years ago.

Whether it's productivity, health, knowledge, leisure ‚Äî we want to highlight these stories and discoveries that can make your life simpler, more impactful, and more enjoyable.

Interested? Click here to sign up!

Was this article helpful? 0 0

If you wish to cancel your order, please contact us immediately and we will do our best to cancel it for you.

However, we cannot guarantee that we will be able to cancel your order as there is a short window of time after order placement when your order can be cancelled.

Was this article helpful? 3 1

If you wish to change your order, please contact us immediately and we will do our best to update it for you.

However, we cannot guarantee that we will be able to modify your order as there is a short window of time after order placement that this can be done.

*Please note, we are unable to change existing orders to include any additional or more expensive items.

Was this article helpful? 0 0

Whether you lose your ring, or lose 20 pounds, we‚Äôve got you covered. Love lasts forever, and we‚Äôve got you covered for life.

Each purchase of the Ridge Ring Set comes with Never Lost Forever Fit Protection. This allows 2 future exchanges or replacements for the same ring in a different or same ring size. The 99-day risk-free trial does not count towards the future exchange or replacement.

Never Lost Forever Fit Protection covers up to 2 replacement rings for the following reasons:

- If the Ring gets lost or stolen

- If the wearer experiences a size change

- If the Ring(s) are damaged or scratched from wear and tear

- If the Ring is broken or torn by accident

- If the wrong size of a personalized Ring is ordered

- If a Ring is purchased outside of ridge.com and is past the return or exchange policy date

The Never Lost Forever Fit Protection Program does not cover damage caused by abuse, neglect, shock, improper use or storage of the product, unauthorized modifications, or repairs.

After receiving a second replacement, a new purchase will be required to re-enter the Never Lost Forever Fit Protection program.

To file an NLFF Claim, please submit a request here.

Was this article helpful? 2 0

Not necessarily. If you are within our 99-day trial period, you can simply complete an exchange.

*Personalized rings are not eligible for return or exchange and will be counted towards one of two replacements with the Never Lost Forever Fit program.

However, if you are past the 99-day trial period, we would be happy to exchange it for you using one of your Never Lost Forever Fit replacements.

Please check out our Return Policy to complete an exchange or return.

Was this article helpful? 1 0

If you are in the 99-day return window, you can simply initiate an exchange for a different style.

If you are outside of the 99-day return window, unfortunately you will only be able to do this by purchasing a new Ring Set.

While our Ring Sets include Never Lost Forever Fit Protection, this only allows 2 future exchanges or replacements for the same style of ring.

Was this article helpful? 0 0

Absolutely! Any personalized wallet purchased from Ridge is covered under the Ridge Warranty.

If there‚Äôs an issue with the functionality of your product, please click here to submit a Warranty Claim and we will help get it functioning again!

Products that are not covered under the Ridge Warranty include items with cosmetic damage or items with damages caused from abuse, neglect or accident.

Unsure if your product qualifies for the Ridge Warranty? Please see our full Ridge Warranty Policy here.

Was this article helpful? 0 0

While all sales on personalized orders are final, if you wish to cancel or modify your order, please contact us immediately and we will do our best to update it for you.

However, we cannot guarantee that we will be able to cancel or modify your order as there is a short window of time after order placement when this can be done.

Was this article helpful? 1 0

We've found getting your cards out of the Ridge wallet can take some getting used to. However, it tends to quickly become second nature.

To best utilize your wallet, we recommend placing your most used cards on the outside of your card stack and closest to the inner plates of the wallet for easy access.

However, when it comes to getting the cards on the inside, we recommend using the fan method, which is similar to when you fan out playing cards.

Here are the fan method steps:

1. Push your cards up through the thumb hole at the bottom of the wallet.

2. Pull your cards out a little more so that the edge of your cards are sticking out in the middle of the elastic.

3. Hold the card closest to you with your thumb, and fan out the rest of the cards with your index finger while holding the back card with the rest of your fingers for stability.

Prefer video tutorials? You can find these on our Getting Started Page!

Was this article helpful? 3 3

Radio-Frequency Identification (RFID) is a technology that uses radio waves to read, write, and store data onto a chip attached to an item. The plastic chip is small and flat with an electronic tag and embedded antenna that can transmit information to an RFID reader. A tag can be read from up to several feet away and does not need to be within direct line-of-sight of the reader to be tracked.

RFID-blocking technology disrupts the electromagnetic waves transmitted by the card reader so that no one can access the information without your permission. Remember, it‚Äôs not just your money they can steal, but also your personal details, including full names and addresses.

RFID-blocking wallets are made from thin, durable metal, such as carbon fiber and aluminum. These special materials prevent unwanted radio frequencies from penetrating the card case and activating the RFID tag on your credit, debit, or ID cards

All of our wallets block RFID with the two aluminum inner plates.

Want to learn more? Feel free to check out our blog post about RFID blocking!

Was this article helpful? 11 0

While we do not sell any wallets this way, you are able to configure your wallet with both the Cash Strap and Money Clip installed.

You can either purchase a Wallet with both included in the package, or you can purchase a Cash Strap wallet and also the replacement Money Clip. Then you will be able to simply add on the Money Clip to the front side of the wallet.

Was this article helpful? 18 1

Carbon Fiber is made in sheets and then filled with resin. Forged Composite uses a paste of fibers (500,000 fibers per square inch) mixed with a resin that is squeezed out to make almost any shape. Since the fibers aren't oriented in any particular direction, the finished part is strong all around, while remaining light. Our Forged Carbon, Forged Ember, Forged Gold and Forged Pacific wallets have the same weight and strength as the Carbon Fiber model just with a different visual appearance.

Was this article helpful? 9 0

Yes! We are proud to be an officially licensed partner of the NFL. You can trust that our products and services are of the highest quality and meet the exceptional standards set forth by the NFL.

As an official partner, we are authorized to sell official NFL merchandise and products and are committed to providing exceptional customer service.

Each of our NFL Wallets comes with an official holographic sticker and an official NFL booklet, which will prove authenticity. If you purchase elsewhere and these aren‚Äôt included - it is not an authentic Ridge Wallet.

Was this article helpful? 1 0

Absolutely!

Rest assured that using the tray will not affect the charging capabilities of your wireless charger. If you do experience any issues, please let us know, as this is not something that should be expected.

Please note that if your wireless charger is elevated and uses the MagSafe functionality, the strengthening tray may disrupt the connection to the elevated or standing MagSafe product.

Was this article helpful? 0 0

At this time, the Ridge Wallet for MagSafe is only compatible with one accessory at a time. The Money Clip, Cash Strap, and AirTag attachments may all be positioned on the back of the Wallet as the MagSafe Plate is positioned on the front of the Wallet.

Please note that the Ridge Wallet for MagSafe is not compatible with the QuickDraw accessory due to the placement of the MagSafe plate.

Was this article helpful? 1 0

At this time, Apple is not currently partnering with any Wallets to make an Apple-certified wallet otherwise identified as ‚ÄúMade for MagSafe‚Äù products. While we are not partnered with Apple and have not conducted Apple‚Äôs official testing, our team has conducted extensive testing to ensure the capabilities of our MagSafe products. As such, our MagSafe Wallets are ‚Äúcompatible with MagSafe‚Äù and are not ‚ÄúMade for MagSafe‚Äù.

Rest assured - our MagSafe Wallets and Plates are safe, secure, and compatible with your iPhone. Our products are backed by a 99-day free trial and Lifetime Warranty, so you can shop confidently.

Was this article helpful? 1 0

While we currently have a limited selection of Ridge Wallets/Plates for MagSafe, we hope to have these available for every style in the future. Unfortunately, we do not have a timeline on when other styles will be available.

As such, we recommend signing up for our newsletter at the bottom of any page on our website to stay in the loop regarding new releases!

Was this article helpful? 0 0

We have a webpage dedicated to helping you find the perfect fit. Here you will find a few different ways to go about finding the perfect fit, these include:

String or floss method:

You can get to the correct ring size using a simple piece of string or dental floss. Here‚Äôs what you need to do:

Wrap the measuring tool (string or floss) around the base of your finger.

Take your pen or marker and mark the place where the string overlaps.

Convert the measurement to a ring size.

Our printable ring sizer chart:

Using the chart to get accurate measurements is relatively easy. Essentially, you‚Äôll need to perform only two steps:

use the chart to measure your existing ring (if available).

Measure the ring finger using the chart.

You should place the ring on the chart so that its inner edge matches with a particular circle on the chart. This will give you the inner circumference of the existing ring, which will be an excellent point for orientation moving forward.

Wrap the strip of paper with the chart around your finger. Find where the strip overlaps and mark the precise point.

Ring sizer tool:

Ring sizing tools are relatively simple to use and come in plastic and metal variants. These tools are essentially special strips that you can wrap around your finger to get precise measurements. A sizer does pretty much the same thing as the described homemade methods. However, as a professional tool, it‚Äôs much more reliable than paper or floss.

You can go to your local jeweler and ask them to use their sizer. Or, if you want to have the tool available at your home, you can find ring sizers available for purchase online.

Was this article helpful? 1 1

Wide vs. narrow bands

Perhaps it doesn‚Äôt sound obvious, but different band widths may call for different sizes. A narrow band will fit nicely at the point where you measured your finger. However, a wide band might be just right for that point but too tight a few millimeters away.

To ensure you have the right size for a wide band, measure where on your finger the band should start and end. Then, use the described methods to get exact dimensions at the highest and lowest points on your finger. If the measurements differ, go with the larger one.

Temperature and finger size fluctuations

Interestingly enough, your finger size isn‚Äôt always the same. We‚Äôve already brought up finger swelling, and that‚Äôs because this phenomenon can happen at any time. The temperature has a particularly strong impact here.

You should account for finger size fluctuations when choosing the ring size. Besides taking care of this aspect when measuring, think about whether your fingers tend to swell often. If so, it might be a good idea to get a slightly larger ring.

International ring size conversion

If you‚Äôre shopping for rings internationally, you should know that not all countries have the same sizing convention for rings. A particular U.S. ring size might be completely different across both the Atlantic and the Pacific.

Fortunately, there‚Äôs a handy conversion chart that you can use to ‚Äútranslate‚Äù one ring size to another. Consult this official international chart to convert ring sizes easily.

Was this article helpful? 0 0

Measuring multiple times

Although a single measurement might seem sufficient, it would be best to repeat it several times. The point here is to get consistent results across all measurements, so you can be sure the dimensions are absolutely right.

Measuring at different times of the day

Since finger size can fluctuate, measuring in the morning, afternoon, and evening will be the optimal way to get reliable results. Measure several times a day, especially when the temperature is at its highest and lowest points.

Accounting for knuckle size

While you‚Äôll measure the actual area of your finger where the ring will be, you‚Äôll do well to take knuckle size into consideration. After all, what good is a beautiful Ridge ring that fits perfectly on your finger if you can‚Äôt get it past the knuckle?

Was this article helpful? 0 0

Each of the Ridge Rings is carefully crafted with a dual-layer design; with an outer beveled edge for on-hand style and comfort and an inner convex shape for a comfortable, no-pinch fit.

The Forged Carbon and Carbon Fiber 3K Weave Rings have an inner Tungsten ring with a Carbon Fiber outer finish.

The Burnt Titanium and Stonewashed Titanium Rings have an outer Titanium Ring with an Inner Titanium Ring designed for comfort.

The 24K Gold, Royal Black, Alpine Navy, and Gunmetal Rings have an inner Tungsten ring for comfort with an outer Tungsten Ring with the color coating for style.

Was this article helpful? 3 1

Unfortunately, no. To ensure our Rings are durable enough to last a lifetime, we use premium materials. Due to these premium materials, jewelers will not be able to resize the ring.

What we can do at this time is process an exchange request if you would like to try a different size!

You can process that request here.

We also have our Never Lost & Forever Fit Protection Program if the wearer ever experiences any size changes in the future.

Was this article helpful? 1 0

Yes! We offer a personalization option on our website!

You can have the Ring engraved on the inner band, the outer band, or both.

Please note all sales on personalized products are final. You will not be able to return or exchange the Ring if it is personalized.

However, you'll still be covered under our Never Lost and Forever Fit Protection. You get two replacements over the ring's lifetime free of charge.

Was this article helpful? 2 0

A simple cleanse with gentle soap and warm water works wonders, or you can opt for specialized cleaning solutions specifically made for silicone jewelry. To maintain the integrity of the material, steer clear of harsh chemicals or abrasive cleaners.

To ensure your Ridge silicone band stands the test of time, avoid exposure to extreme temperatures or extended periods of sunlight, as these factors may lead to discoloration or warping. Also, avoid wearing your band during activities that involve heavy impact or that come into contact with sharp objects.

Was this article helpful? 0 0

Our silicone wedding rings boast a multitude of benefits when compared to traditional mens rings. A standout feature is their safety aspect; silicone bands are non-conductive, ensuring they won‚Äôt carry electricity like metal rings can. This safety feature makes them a top choice for professionals in industries where electrical hazards are a concern.

Additionally, Ridge bands offer remarkable resistance to scratches and dents, exceeding what metal alternatives can provide. With a variety of colors and designs currently on the market, silicone rings allow you to showcase your unique style while representing your lifelong commitment.

Was this article helpful? 0 0

While we do not sell any wallets this way, you can achieve this by ordering a Money Clip wallet and removing the clip.

This can be done by loosening the screws around the clip, sliding it out, and then re-tightening the screws to reconnect the Inner and Outer Plates.

If you already have a Cash Strap wallet, you can purchase a Money Clip Elastic, switch the Elastics out and you're all set!

Was this article helpful? 2 0

Before attaching the AirTag¬Æ Money Clip to your Ridge wallet, install the Apple AirTag¬Æ in the Money Clip.

Use the provided T5 Torx driver to remove all 4 screws from the back of the Clip and remove the back plate.

Insert the AirTag¬Æ into the Money Clip with the Apple Logo facing you.

Replace the backside of the clip and all 4 screws. Ensuring all screws are securely tightened.

Attach the AirTag¬Æ Money Clip to your Wallet.

Our wallets are constructed with Inner Plates and Outer Plates. There should be small indents near the edge of one of the Inner Plates.

Remove the 4 screws nearest the indents.

Line up the Money Clip on these indents, with the Money Clip facing towards the outside, and screw the Outer Plate back on so that it squeezes the small parts of the Money Clip between the Inner Plate and the Outer Plate.

Be sure to tighten the screws down to ensure the Money Clip is secure.

Please note that the Outer Plate should be the only thing holding the AirTag¬Æ Money Clip onto your wallet. The same steps highlighted in the following video can be used to install your AirTag¬Æ Money Clip after installing your AirTag¬Æ into the Money Clip: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nOpex0bzXZg&feature=youtu.be

Was this article helpful? 1 0

Step 1: Opening - Use the thin edge of the Bolt Tool to unscrew the large, top screw near the open end of the organizer. There is no need to unscrew anything other than this.

Step 2: Inserting - Hold the tension plate down with your thumb and place the keys on the dowel. The keys should lay perpendicular to the plate in an L shape. The Keycase will secure 2-6 keys.

Step 3: Securing - Place the top plate back to align with the dowel. Insert the screw back through the plate into the dowel. Tighten in place, you should not need to apply too much pressure. You will feel clicks as the locking mechanism falls in and out of place and the screw gradually tightens and secure the plate and keys. Do not over-tighten.

Was this article helpful? 2 1

Some customers have expressed difficulties getting the KeyCase to reassemble after taking the clip off. The clip does help to keep the tension in the plates and allows small amounts of keys to be used and to stay in place.

To reassemble the KeyCase clip please complete the following:

Place the small rectangular piece with the half circle facing down on the bolt piece

If the bolt piece is not sitting flush itself, you may need to twist it around until it sits flush.

Make sure the rectangular piece is sitting flush

Then place the clip on top of this

Screw in each screw on the clip while keeping the rectangular piece and bolt flush

Should you have any trouble, here is a video that walks you through the same steps.

Was this article helpful? 0 0

POS. I SETTING DATE & 24-HOUR DISPLAY (GMT HAND)

Unscrew and pull the crown to position I

Rotate clockwise to adjust the date and counterclockwise to adjust the 24-hour display

Push the crown to Unlocked Position, then in one motion push crown in and screw down to Locked Position

POS. II SETTING THE TIME

Unscrew and pull the crown to position II

Rotate clockwise until the current time is displayed

Push the crown to Unlocked Position, then in one motion push crown in and screw down to Locked Position

SETTING AM/PM (MIDNIGHT/NOON)

When setting the time (POS II), rotate the hour hand past 12 o‚Äôclock and note the date window. If the date changes it is midnight, if the date does not change it is noon.

Was this article helpful? 0 0

The Land & Sea Watch has been assembled with a genuine Swiss Ronda movement from the Powertech family. It is extremely accurate and rated within -10/+20 seconds per month.

Please note: It is extremely important to firmly screw the crown down after setting the time to avoid water damage and to retain the rated water resistance. Failure to screw down the crown can result in water damage that will not be covered under warranty.

Was this article helpful? 0 0

While both of our backpacks are wonderful options, one may fit your needs better than the other.

The Commuter Backpack is weatherproof and has a shock-resistant laptop holder making it ideal for carrying electronics. It also features a luggage strap for ease of use when traveling. The Commuter Backpack is a great option for travel and everyday adventures.

The Packable Backpack can easily be packed into the size of a water bottle and offers all the benefits of a traditional backpack. Easily store it wherever is most convenient and it will be ready whenever you are! It is great for hiking, adventures, theme-parks and travel.

It all comes down to personal preference. Whichever backpack you choose - you won't regret it!

Was this article helpful? 0 0

The accessory that comes with the backpack is a customized divider. You can use this divider to keep delicate items at the top of your bag or to organize and separate different items. The velcro feature of the divider allows you to adjust its height according to your preference, giving you complete control over how you use your backpack. However, if you prefer not to use it, you can simply set it aside!

Was this article helpful? 2 0

Yes, our Summit Knives have been discontinued.

However, we have plans to release a new model within the coming year.

If you would like to be kept up-to-date on any new products or promotions we are offering, please sign up for the newsletter at the bottom of any page on our website!

We appreciate your patience as we strive to bring you the best Everyday gear!

Was this article helpful? 9 1

No. The Simple Modern Water Bottle is not dishwasher-safe and should be hand-washed after every use. We do not recommend placing it in the dishwasher as this could cause exterior damage and discoloration. The lid is top-rack dishwasher safe.

Soak your bottle or tumbler in warm, soapy water for 10 minutes (soaking for long periods of time could cause damage to your bottle). Then, clean all parts of your product and lid thoroughly. After washing, rinse and set aside to air dry, storing your bottle and tumbler separately from its lid.

In need of a deep clean? Mix 1 part cleaning vinegar, 1 part water, and 1 Tbsp. baking soda inside your bottle. Let that sit overnight. The next day, pour out ¬æ of the mixture and add another 1 Tbsp. of baking soda. Scrub thoroughly, rinse, then set aside to air dry.

Was this article helpful? 0 0

To get the most out of your Ridge Razor by OneBlade, you may need to use a different technique than you typically use, and it may take a few tries to get used to the OneBlade Razor!

Important things to note:

Blade angle and head pivot

The OneBlade razor was designed with a pivot that allows it to maintain the perfect blade angle to the skin, but ONLY if the pivot is being engaged.

Let the pivot joint on the head function as a shock absorber as the razor head glides over the uneven surfaces of the hair and the skin.

Putting any pressure on the tip of the blade edge to achieve a closer shave will not be successful and will likely result in discomfort and irritation.

Grip the handle closer to the head and put a very slight amount of pressure on the upper register of the head (the bar that crosses over the top of the blade), allowing the pivot to engage.

Routine

Be sure to either shave after a hot shower or take the time to wash your face with warm water before you shave. This is crucial for softening the hair.

Always use shaving cream!

3-Pass Shave

It's highly recommended to shave with three full passes when using a OneBlade razor.

Begin by lathering your whole shaving area with your shaving cream or shave soap of choice.

On your first pass, make long, slightly overlapping strokes with the grain.

Re-lather, then on the second pass, make shorter, overlapping strokes going across the grain.

Re-lather as needed, then on your third pass, go against the grain if necessary.

We recommend watching OneBlade‚Äôs tutorial, which can be found here.

Was this article helpful? 0 0

The Ridge Razor by OneBlade is covered by a lifetime warranty!

Ridge warrants that the Ridge Razor by OneBlade is free from manufacturing defects and is functional as intended for the life of the product.

Please note that this warranty does not cover lost, stolen, or disposed of Bottles; cosmetic damage; damage caused by accident, abuse, neglect, shock, improper use or storage of the product; or unauthorized modifications or repairs.

If you need to submit a Warranty Claim, please do that here.

Was this article helpful? 0 0

We recommend using pliers to gently grip the blade, lift it up, and pull it firmly backward. This should remove the blade without any damage to the razor. Just be careful not to lift up with too much force.

This may be caused by shaving cream, whiskers, or minerals in tap water building up inside the razor head over time, leading to a lodged blade. If this is the case, cleaning the razor thoroughly is a good idea.

Instructions for cleaning your OneBlade Razor can be found here.

Was this article helpful? 0 0

Our goal in designing the Ridge Check-In was to create a bag that is minimalist yet substantial, thoughtful but not overbuilt. We paid attention to every detail to ensure it is functional and durable while retaining its sleek design.

The key aspects that set it apart from other bags and enhance your travel experience include but are not limited to:

Weatherproof - IPX3 Waterproof Rating

Oversized 360¬∞ spinner wheels

An interchangeable Carbon Fiber 3k Universal logo plate

AirTag/GPS tracker pocket

Lifetime Warranty

In addition to this, we also include a leather luggage tag, laundry bag, shoe bag, and melamine foam eraser.

We also offer a 99-day return window for our Ridge Check-In so you can shop confidently.

Was this article helpful? 0 0

Our goal in designing the Ridge Carry-On was to create a bag that is minimalist yet substantial, thoughtful but not overbuilt. We paid attention to every detail to ensure it is functional and durable while retaining its sleek design.

The key aspects that set it apart from other bags and enhance your travel experience include but are not limited to:

Weatherproof - IPX3 Waterproof Rating

Oversized 360¬∞ spinner wheels

An interchangeable Carbon Fiber 3k Universal logo plate

AirTag/GPS tracker pocket

Lifetime Warranty

In addition to this, we also include a leather luggage tag, laundry bag, shoe bag, and melamine foam eraser.

We also offer a 99-day return window for our Ridge Carry-On so you can shop confidently.

Was this article helpful? 0 0

While our Carry-On is not expandable, if you are looking for something with more room, we recently released a Check-In. It features an additional 22 liters of capacity compared to the Carry-On!

You can find our Check-In here.

Regardless of which bag you choose, we are confident that you will love your new Ridge bag. We also offer a 99-day return window for our Ridge Carry-On and Check-In so you can shop confidently.

Was this article helpful? 0 0

Absolutely! The Strengthening Tray can be attached to any phone case as it features adhesive backing. The Strengthening Tray acts as a locking device to ensure that your Ridge Wallet doesn‚Äôt slide.

Although the Strengthening Tray is optional, we recommend it to ensure the strongest connection possible if you aren‚Äôt using any other MagSafe-compatible products. During our thorough testing, we observed that the wallet can twist to the side without the tray, which reduces the strength of the magnetic connection and makes it less secure.

Was this article helpful? 0 0

If you are not 100% satisfied with your Ridge purchase, you can return your order to our warehouse for a refund or exchange within 99 days of purchase.

We offer Free Domestic Returns + Exchanges and will provide you with a digital Prepaid USPS label that will need to be printed. You can view our full Return Policy here.

If you are based in the United States, you can use the Return/Exchange Portal here.

If you have any questions, please submit a request using our Contact Form or contact us via email at support@ridge.com.

Was this article helpful? 1 3

All return labels provided by Ridge are digital. Ridge is not responsible for providing a physical return label.

Select USPS locations will accept a QR code that may be used in place of a return label. You can find locations that accept a QR code in place of a label here.

If no USPS location near you accepts QR codes, you could also go to a local library or a print shop like Staples to print the return label.

Was this article helpful? 0 1

All non-personalized orders will be scheduled for shipment in 1-2 business days, excluding holidays. Orders placed after 11AM PST on Fridays may not be processed for shipping until the following Monday morning. Once your order has been processed for shipment, you will receive an automated shipping notification with your tracking information.

For personalized orders, there is a one week processing time to personalize your order. Once your order has been processed, it will be shipped and should arrive to you in 4-7 business days.

Was this article helpful? 8 3

Unfortunately there may be delivery delays due to reasons outside of our control such as carrier delays, severe weather, natural disasters, or labor strikes.

We ship all orders within 1-2 business days and once shipped provide a tracking confirmation email to the email address provided. Once a package leaves our facility, we no longer control how your order is handled or where it is sent before delivery.

Please check the USPS and UPS websites for their statements on current delays and transit times.

*If your order has not been delivered within 14 days, please contact our Customer Support Team for assistance.

Was this article helpful? 1 3

We ask that you please allow 3 additional business days past the ‚Äúdelivered‚Äù scan as the carrier may have accidentally scanned the delivery too early. If your package still has not arrived, please contact us.

*Please be sure to check around for your package; some carriers leave packages in hidden places so it cannot be seen from the street. Check to see if someone else, like a neighbor or an Apartment Office Manager, accepted delivery on your behalf.

Was this article helpful? 1 4

We appreciate your patience. We ask that you wait four additional business days beyond your Expected Delivery Date. If your package still has not arrived by that time, please contact us and we would be happy to help investigate and reach out to our carriers when needed.

*Claims of missed/incorrect deliveries will not be accepted past 45 days of the order being placed. We ask that these issues be brought to our attention as soon as possible.

Was this article helpful? 1 0

If you do not receive an automated shipping notification titled ‚ÄúYour package is on the way üööüí®‚Äù containing your tracking information within 3 business days of placing your order, please check your Spam and/or Promotions folders.

If you are unable to find this email in your Spam and/or Promotion folders, please reach out and we would be happy to help!

Was this article helpful? 0 1

Orders shipping to an APO, FPO, or DPO address will need to be placed on our US site and will be treated as a domestic order when shipping, but may be treated as an international order when returning.

For more information on how to format your military address, please follow USPS guidelines which can be found here.

We do apologize but at this time we cannot offer Express services to APO/FPO/DPO addresses.

Was this article helpful? 4 0

Once your order has shipped, Ridge cannot be held liable for any damages or losses incurred in transit. While we take every precaution to ensure the safe delivery of your items, we are not responsible for circumstances beyond our control. As such, we strongly recommend monitoring the progress of your shipment using the provided tracking information and reaching out to the shipping carrier for any updates or concerns.

If you have any questions or require assistance, please don't hesitate to contact our Customer Success Team.

Was this article helpful? 0 2

The lifetime of your Ridge gear references the lifetime of the functionality.

We‚Äôve designed our products for long term reliability ‚Äî as in, a lifetime. If you ever feel your Ridge Wallet or other Ridge product isn‚Äôt functioning properly, we‚Äôll do everything we can to make it right.

Each purchase with Ridge is just the beginning of many years of a better Everyday Carry experience. Glad to have you aboard!

Was this article helpful? 4 0

Wallets:

Ridge warrants that the purchased product is free from manufacturing defects and will function as intended for the life of the product. Your Lifetime Warranty will include Replacement Parts in the event of failure or loss of Elastic, Screws, Inner Plates, and/or Money Clip.

This warranty does not cover lost, stolen, or disposed of wallets; scratches, dents, chips, and/or scrapes on the Outer Plates; damages caused by accident, abuse, neglect, or shock; improper use or storage of the product; unauthorized modifications or repairs.

Other Products:

Ridge warrants that all non-wallet products are free from manufacturing defects and are functional as intended for the lifespan of the Warranty.

This warranty does not cover lost, stolen, or disposed of products; cosmetic damage, damage caused by accident, abuse, neglect, or shock; improper use or storage of the product; unauthorized modifications or repairs.

The Ridge Beveled Ring Set:

Each purchase of a Ridge Ring Set comes with Never Lost Forever Fit Protection. This allows 2 future exchanges or replacements for the same ring in a different or same ring size. The 99-day risk-free trial does not count towards the future exchange or replacement.

Never Lost Forever Fit Protection Includes:

If the Ring gets lost or stolen

If the wearer experiences a size change

If the Ring(s) are damaged or scratched from wear and tear

If the ring is broken or torn by accident

If the wrong size of a personalized ring is ordered

Proof of purchase may be required for a lost or stolen replacement to be initiated.

The Never Lost Forever Fit protection program does not cover cosmetic damage, damage caused by accident, abuse, neglect, shock, improper use or storage of the product, unauthorized modifications or repairs.

More details can be found here.

Polycarbonate Wallets predate our Lifetime Warranty and came with a 1 year Limited Warranty.

We reserve the right to deny any Warranty Claim if we believe the claim to be fraudulent or if the item was purchased before implementation of our Lifetime Warranty or if the Wallet was purchased from an unauthorized seller such as, but not limited to, Facebook Marketplace and e-Bay.

This Warranty does not include service to items in the claim.

Please note that if your Ridge product is eligible for a replacement then your replacement will be the same color and material of your purchased product. If your product is no longer in stock than your replacement will be of a similar material and color.
